verses.text:
On Zion's hill I stand,
And view the promised land;
The milk and honey flow,
And grapes of Eshcol grow.

There Abraham, Isaac, Jacob stand,
With harps within their hand;
They strike the strings with skill,
On Zion's holy hill.

King David with his harp,
Doth make the music sharp;
With his ten thousand voices,
The heavenly host rejoices.

The angels do appear,
With crowns upon their heads;
The elders too are there,
With golden harps in hand.

And round about the throne,
The ransomed ones are come;
With palms within their hands,
Before the Lamb they stand.

O may I with them stand,
A harp within my hand;
And there with them combine,
To sing the song divine.
